# UI / UX Wireframes

> ASCII wireframes for the three primary views. Use these as reference when building dashboard components.

- Repo cards with current score + trend direction (â–¼ good = fewer issues, â–² bad = more issues)
- Quick insights panel â€” surfaced from recommendation engine
- Empty state â†’ guide to connect first repo + run CLI

## Implementation Notes

- All trend charts implemented with **D3.js** or **Chart.js** â€” component lives in `packages/components`
- Severity colours: ğŸ”´ critical (`#ef4444`), ğŸŸ  major (`#f97316`), ğŸŸ¡ minor (`#eab308`), âš« info
- "Run New Analysis" triggers `POST /analysis/upload` and shows a loading state via WebSocket push
- Locked features (benchmarks, CI tab) render a subtle upgrade prompt for Free users
